long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mio helps you easily and efficiently plan solo and group trips with AI-generated travel itineraries. 

Invite your friends, add your trip details and activities and Mio will generate the most efficient route and itinerary so you and your friends can get the most out of your trip.

You can save whole pages or individual activities and Mio will identify addresses and commute time between each activity. No more manual planning with spreadsheets and searching individual addresses. As new activities get added, Mio will dynamically update the itinerary. 

Customize your itinerary with breaks, food, and more so you can vacation how you want. Get updates and reminders for nearby recommendations or saved activities.

✨ Save time: No more manual searching and planning
✨ Share and customize: Invite friends and make the most out of your vacation
✨ Travel smart: Never miss out on your favorite activities or experiences 

Vacation how you want, doing as little or as much as you'd like. Let Mio make it happen.
